content: *in body color or accent color -- crochet in row -- no single_crochet turn at the end of each row just insert into the stitch closest to the hook* attach to the last row of the body row 22 beginning at the 12th stitch from the edge you ll start your row one in the 12th stitch row 1 7 single_crochet turn = 7 sts fig 18 7 single_crochet turn = 7 sts row 2 7 single_crochet turn = 7 sts 2 increase 3 single_crochet 2 increase turn = 11 sts row 3 5 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet turn = 12 sts increase 10 single_crochet increase turn = 14 sts 10 © emmy scanga 2020 tummy continued row 4 14 single_crochet turn = 14 sts increase 12 single_crochet increase turn = 16 sts row 5 increase 14 single_crochet increase turn = 18 sts 18 single_crochet turn = 18 sts row 6 through row 10 18 single_crochet turn = 18 sts 18 single_crochet turn = 18 sts mark 1st and row 11 decrease 14 single_crochet decrease turn = 16 sts last sts of this row line decrease 12 single_crochet decrease turn = 14 sts row 12 decrease 10 single_crochet decrease turn = 12 sts decrease 8 single_crochet decrease turn = 10 sts mark 1st and finished tummy piece row 13 2 increase 6 single_crochet 2 increase turn = 14 sts last sts of this row line 14 single_crochet turn = 14 sts row 14 14 single_crochet turn = 14 sts 14 single_crochet turn = 14 sts mark 1st and row 15 2 decrease 6 single_crochet 2 decrease turn = 10 sts last sts of this row line decrease 6 single_crochet decrease turn = 8 sts mark 1st and row 16 8 single_crochet turn = 8 sts last sts of row markers this row line be sure to leave the row markers in 4 decrease turn = 4 sts place row 17 through row 19 4 single_crochet turn = 4 sts you ll use the row markers to map out 4 single_crochet turn = 4 sts where certain pieces will need to line up for the assembly process row 20 4 single_crochet turn = 4 sts 2 decrease turn = 2 sts you can do this after crocheting all the body pieces or as you go as i marked throughout the pattern bind off with short tail tail will be hidden in body during the i ve also listed them before assembling assembly process if you lose a marker in the process 11 © emmy scanga 2020 front foot make 2 hind foot make 2 *in body color -- crochet in the round* *in body color -- crochet in the round* round 1 mc 8 single_crochet = 8 sts round 1 mc 8 single_crochet = 8 sts round 2 single_crochet around = 8 sts round 2 single_crochet around = 8 sts round 3 increase around = 16 sts round 3 increase around = 16 sts round 4 and round 5 single_crochet around
